title: Gamification-Based Mobile Learning Design for Circulatory System Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Biological Terminology (Cardiovascular System: Heart, Blood Vessels, Blood Cells)
context.additional_context: Learners are university students or job seekers with elementary-level biology knowledge, participating in offline classes utilizing mobile devices and gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can explain the main structures (heart, arteries, veins, capillaries) and functions of the circulatory system.
Learners can distinguish and explain the components of blood (red blood cells, white blood cells, platelets, plasma) and the functions of each.
Learners can simulate the blood circulation process using a gamified mobile app and analyze real experimental data (blood pressure, blood flow velocity).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
